channel.title: DemonClassic Error
channel.description: Anyone else get an error right after the server connects to MySql? Looks like this: [code] [java] [17:09:02 12-08-08] Server starting up... [java] [17:09:02 12-08-08] Updating Variables... [java] .\conf [java] com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: GameObjectL oc : GameObjectLoc [java] ---- Debugging information ---- [java] message : GameObjectLoc : GameObjectLoc com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.CannotResolveCl assException [java] required-type : java.util.LinkedList [java] ------------------------------- [java] [17:09:03 12-08-08] Connected to MySQL [java] Are you using the same conf files that came with RustyOnline?

item.title: DemonClassic Error
item.dc:creator: @ravfe ravfe
item.description:
@ravfe wrote:

freaky5000:

Well the error tells you it’s in gameobject.xml loc so have you change anything in their? if so change it back and try again.

gathered all that, and no I haven’t changed anything. I’ll take a look around and see what should be changed to make it work.

What I dug up on google regarding this type of error:
public class ConversionException
extends XStreamException
implements ErrorWriter

Thrown by Converter implementations when they cannot convert an object to/from textual data. When this exception is thrown it can be passed around to things that accept an ErrorWriter, allowing them to add diagnostics to the stack trace.

http://xstream.codehaus.org/javadoc/com/thoughtworks/xstream/converters/ConversionException.html

Read full topic

item.title: DemonClassic Error
item.dc:creator: @ravfe ravfe
item.description:
@ravfe wrote:

Anyone else get an error right after the server connects to MySql?
Looks like this:

     [java] [17:09:02 12-08-08] Server starting up...
     [java] [17:09:02 12-08-08] Updating Variables...
     [java] .\conf
     [java] com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: GameObjectL
oc : GameObjectLoc
     [java] ---- Debugging information ----
     [java] message             : GameObjectLoc : GameObjectLoc
     [java] line number         : 3
     [java] path                : /linked-list/GameObjectLoc
     [java] cause-message       : GameObjectLoc : GameObjectLoc

assException

lveClassException: PacketHandler : PacketHandler

ltMapper.java:35)
